title: What weapons can Russia use to counter attack?
text:
What weapons can Russia use to counter attack? 7:52pm BST - 01:53 
With Russia threatening to counter any attack on Syria by the U.S., France and UK, Reuters has analyzed the weaponry at it's disposal. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
With Russia threatening to counter any attack on Syria by the U.S., France and UK, Reuters has analyzed the weaponry at it's disposal. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2HzBocG
